title: Adaptive Educational Material Development Workshop Based on Primary Scientific Literature

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific literacy and academic text comprehension skills
context.additional_context: Learners acquire primary literature analysis and educational transformation skills through developing science education materials, while engaging in collaborative activities in a blended environment. Online sessions focus on literature analysis methodologies, while offline sessions involve peer feedback and prototyping activities.

learning_goals: Learners can develop three or more APL (Adaptive Primary Literature) materials that reorganize primary science literature for educational purposes
Learners can design two or more classroom activities to enhance scientific discourse and academic literacy using developed APL materials
Learners can write a report analyzing the educational effectiveness of APL materials through peer evaluation

resources: Access to Primary Literature Database in Science Fields

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
